newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: SFE wheat firm but quiet on Chicago rally hopes.
newsitem.headline: SFE wheat firm but quiet on Chicago rally hopes.

text.p: Sydney Futures Exchange wheat firmed on Wednesday with four lots traded in January 1998.

The contract rose by A$3.00 to the traded price of A$174.00 compared with the previous day's settlement close. Wednesday's closing settlement price of A$173.00 was A$2.00 higher on the previous day's settlement close.
Across the contract range, most settlement prices rose on Wednesday by about A$2.00 a tonne.
Brendan Hillary of ANZ Futures said the market was quiet in the hope of a rally in Chicago.
